Package me.agno.gridjavacore.columns

Interface IGridColumn<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of data in the column
All Superinterfaces:
IColumn<T>, IFilterableColumn<T>, ISearchableColumn<T>, ISortableColumn<T>, ITotalsColumn<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridCoreColumn
public interface IGridColumn<T> extends IColumn<T>, ISortableColumn<T>, IFilterableColumn<T>, ISearchableColumn<T>, ITotalsColumn<T>
Represents a column in a grid that implements several interfaces for sorting, filtering, searching, and calculation.

      Sets whether the column is hidden.
